au.edu.apsr.mtk.base
Class METSWrapper

java.lang.Object
  au.edu.apsr.mtk.base.METSWrapper

public class METSWrapper
extends java.lang.Object

Class for wrapping METS documents. Because different profiles will have different requirements only a DOM Document object get is currently supported.

Author:
Scott Yeadon

Constructor Summary

          Construct a METS wrapper containing an empty METS document.

Constructor Detail

METSWrapper

public METSWrapper()
            throws METSException
Construct a METS wrapper containing an empty METS document. The METS document will consist only of a METS element with no attributes set and no sub-elements. Used when creating a new METS document.

Throws:
METSException

METSWrapper

public METSWrapper(org.w3c.dom.Document d)
            throws METSException
Construct a METS wrapper for an existing METS document.

Parameters:
d - A w3c Document representing a METS DOM
Throws:
METSException

Obtain the DOM document

Returns:

getMETSObject

public METS getMETSObject()
Obtain a METS object

Returns:
METS a METS object representing a METS root element

write

public void write(java.io.OutputStream os)
Write a METS document to an output stream

Parameters:
os - The OutputStream to write the data to

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Output a METS document in string form. Note the string will be UTF-16

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
String The METS document in string form

validate

public void validate()
              throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                     java.net.MalformedURLException,
                     java.io.IOException
Validate against the most recent mets schema. The schema is accessed remotely so may hang or be delayed. If wanting to use a local cached schema use the other validate method

Throws:
org.xml.sax.SAXException - if document is invalid
java.net.MalformedURLException - if schema URL is invalid
java.io.IOException - if URL stream cannot be accessed

validate

public void validate(java.lang.String schemaUrl)
              throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                     java.net.MalformedURLException,
                     java.io.IOException
Validate against the most recent mets schema. The schema is accessed remotely so may hang or be delayed. If wanting to use a local cached schema use the other validate method

Parameters:
schemaUrl - the URL of a schema to validate the METS document against
Throws:
org.xml.sax.SAXException - if document is invalid
java.net.MalformedURLException - if schema URL is invalid
java.io.IOException - if URL stream cannot be accessed
